scripts.build:local: slidev build slides.md --out dist --base / & slidev build latt.md --out dist/latt --base /latt/ & slidev build medel.md --out dist/medel --base /medel/ & slidev build svar.md --out dist/svar --base /svar/ & wait
scripts.build: slidev build slides.md --out dist --base /schack-quiz/ & slidev build latt.md --out dist/latt --base /schack-quiz/latt/ & slidev build medel.md --out dist/medel --base /schack-quiz/medel/ & slidev build svar.md --out dist/svar --base /schack-quiz/svar/ & wait
